snippet: Djokovic reached the semifinals with a 6-3, 7-5 victory over Tomas Berdych in their round-robin match, and Federer clinched first place in the group by beating Kei Nishikori, 7-5, 4-6, 6-4.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Tomas Berdych to reach semifinals of ATP World Tour Finals tennis tournament.
lead_paragraph: Djokovic reached the semifinals with a 6-3, 7-5 victory over Tomas Berdych in their round-robin match, and Federer clinched first place in the group by beating Kei Nishikori, 7-5, 4-6, 6-4.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer Advance at World Tour Finals
headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Federer Advance at World Tour Finals
